termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.introductionContent: Welcome to 2Go Massage. These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform that connects users with independent massage therapy professionals. By using our service, you agree to these terms in full.
termsPage.serviceDescriptionContent: 2Go Massage is an advertising platform for discovering and contacting independent massage therapists. We are not an employer of therapists and do not provide massage services ourselves. We act as a neutral venue for therapists to advertise their services. 2Go Massage is not responsible for any issues, disputes, or interactions that occur between the customer and the therapist. Any agreement to provide massage services is strictly between the user and the therapist.
termsPage.userResponsibilitiesContent: You agree to provide a safe and appropriate environment for the therapist. You must treat therapists with respect and professionalism. Any form of harassment, abuse, or illegal activity is strictly prohibited and will result in a permanent ban from the platform.
termsPage.therapistResponsibilitiesContent: Therapists are independent contractors responsible for their own licensing, insurance, and compliance with all local laws. Therapists must accurately represent their skills, qualifications, and services. Professional conduct is required at all times.
termsPage.disclaimerContent: 2Go Massage is provided 'as is'. We make no warranties regarding the conduct of users or therapists and are not a party to any agreement between them. We are not responsible for any disputes, injuries, or damages that may arise from interactions facilitated through the platform. Your safety is your own responsibility when engaging a service provider.
termsPage.changesToTermsContent: We may modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any changes, and continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

packageDetailsPage.subtitle: Understanding the terms for a safe and professional experience.
packageDetailsPage.paymentContent: Full payment is due upon the therapist's arrival, before the session begins. Payments can be made via cash or direct bank transfer. Please ensure payment is ready to avoid delays.
packageDetailsPage.cancellationContent: Both clients and therapists reserve the right to cancel a session at any time for any reason. A therapist will terminate the service immediately if they feel unsafe, uncomfortable, if the client has consumed alcohol, or if additional, unannounced individuals are present in the service area. This is non-negotiable and ensures the safety of our professionals.
packageDetailsPage.serviceStandardContent: If the massage service is not up to the required standards, you have the right to end the session. We encourage honest ratings with clear explanations of your experience and preferences. Please feel free to communicate with your therapist at any time during your massage to ensure your comfort and satisfaction.
